abstract: We obtain some new nonexistence results of generalized bent functions from \({\mathbb {Z}}^n_q\) to \({\mathbb {Z}}_q\) (called type [n, q]) in the case that there exist cyclotomic integers in \( {\mathbb {Z}}[\zeta _{q}]\) with absolute value \(q^{\frac{n}{2}}\). This result generalizes two previous nonexistence results \([n,q]=[1,2\times 7]\) of Pei (Lect Notes Pure Appl Math 141:165–172, 1993) and \([3,2\times 23^e]\) of Jiang and Deng (Des Codes Cryptogr 75:375–385, 2015). We also remark that by using a same method one can get similar nonexistence results of GBFs from \({\mathbb {Z}}^n_2\) to \({\mathbb {Z}}_m\).
